title: Musicals and Politics
description: It's a thing. NPR film critic Bob Mondello joins host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, editor/correspondent Ron Elving, and digital political correspondent Danielle Kurtzleben to talk about when musicals and politics collide. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
